website_summaries.verdict: While we love how easy it is to smooth this primer all over your face, it's not the best choice for very oily skin. However, if you only need minimal oil control, give it a try.
pros: Earns praise for having a creamy texture that makes it easy to apply, unlike some silicone-based primers
Makes skin feel soft and silky and isn't overly drying or heavy whether you wear it under makeup or alone
A little goes a long way
cons: Initially controls oil but tends to require blotting with face powder as the day goes on
Doesn't wear well on very humid days

customer_reviews.title: Oily gal here.
customer_reviews.text: Not a very good primer. I have oily skin, after a few hours, I need to re-apply my powder, specifically on my nose. I was disappointed, I've had better experiences with NYX products. I wouldn't recommend this to a friend. Look elsewhere oily skin type people.
customer_reviews.author: phantomco

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, easy application
customer_reviews.text: I like the silky smooth feel of this product. I do have to layer products to get all-day lasting effects, but unlike others I've used, this product goes on very smoothly and causes no problems whatsoever with foundation application. I do get some shine towards the end of the day but with my oily skin, that's to be expected. This will probably be my go-to mattifier since my favorite has seemingly been discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Jannine S. Thorne

customer_reviews.title: NYX = Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used it for a few days now and perfectly blends, soft and creamy. My biggest pet peeve is feeling “heavy or cakey,” NYX is One of my favorite Products and this is the perfect primer. I don’t use a lot of concealers or foundation but a bit of this on my brush with a light moisturizer and I’m done. It’s wonderful. I bought two and am pleased I did! Pardon the low quality image but I just snapped it last night before washing my face. I wore it all day and never creased or left that weird residue (that I have personally experienced with other products).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat the price
customer_reviews.text: Ive been searching for a great affordable primer for everyday use and I've finally found the right one. I work 12 hour shifts and this primer helps my makeup stay on throughout the entire time AND it does exactly what it says- kills shine. I have mixed skin and this primer sets the balance perfectly. Will definitely continue to buy. Only thing I would say is that the bottle is too small and does not last long. Wish I could buy a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Controls shine
customer_reviews.text: I like this primer for my t-zone as well as my chin and forehead before applying makeup. It works best for me in the summer when it's hot and especially humid out.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: dissapointed...  Made my face shinier
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to really receive this product and I really really wanted to like it, I have very oily skin and so I fight shine all the time. But this product seem to make my face even shinier and made my make up not stay on very well at all. If I touch my face all my make up just wiped off and smeared. Really disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Miller22

customer_reviews.title: Favorite primer
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It’s my go to primer every time. I even use it when not wearing makeup or very little makeup. I have pretty oily skin and this keeps me from getting shiny throughout the day. And doesn’t clog pores or make my acne worse.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe D.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my most favorite primers! I have tried a few different brands and haven't found any I've absolutely loved. This one however takes the cake! It helps my make up stay matte and in place, even during work or physical activity. It helps control any shine, especially when used with NYX's finishing powder. I just wish it came in a bigger tube!! You get a good amount for what you pay for though, I love how cheap it is,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this combo
customer_reviews.text: These combined definitely makes my makeup look so bomb. I have oily skin so sometimes the shine goes through about 4–5 hours but it’s nothing blotting paper can’t fix. Definitely worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Chiak Nanams

customer_reviews.title: Not seeing a difference
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty oily skin, and got this along with two other primers to try out. This one was my least favorite. It felt like it never dried down all the way, or did whatever it needed to in order to function properly. It didn't really affect my application or wear time, but at the same time it didn't help.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Kind of helps
customer_reviews.text: This does help with shininess but very little. Instead of being shiny in an hour it was 2 hours. And it seemed to let little "leaks" of oil through so my nose looked like it was splashed with water. Not sure I'd recommended this without an extra base.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Best product for shine control!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works! A thin layer under the foundation stops shine. Even in the south where you sweat daily, this stuff really controls shines. If you do get shiny, you can apply it over your makeup as well. Best product I've tried to minimize shine!
customer_reviews.author: Ang Rags

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the Tula primer (which is not so great for oily skin). It is less glossy, BUT i use powder foundation and it will come off when applying primer with a brush. Maybe it is not so build-able. I have to not tried it with cream foundation yet, but im content with it for the mean time
customer_reviews.author: Alita

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really works!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! I have very oily skin and this kept me shine free for hours!!! Feels silky smooth when you apply it and foundation goes on better than it would without it!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy B.

customer_reviews.title: Very oily and doesn’t stop the shine if you already have oily skin
customer_reviews.text: The shine killer doesn’t help my oily shiny skin and if anything I felt it made it worse. It’s very oily and feels oily when I apply it on my already oily face. I still have yet to meet a primer that works better than benefit porefessional(hate the $30 price though)
customer_reviews.author: MUMMY

customer_reviews.title: Will Reorder
customer_reviews.text: I will buy this again. It's the only primer I have found that doesn't cause breakouts. It also works at cutting shine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does it’s job!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, it’s lightweight and easy to carry. I bought this hoping it’ll help reduce the sheen from my oily skin. Which it does but as much as I would like, overall it’s worth it when you’re on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Chiak Nanams

customer_reviews.title: Feels gross. Terrible product.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd try a new brand that was less expensive, but this was not the right choice. There's truth in "you get what you pay for", and I should've listened to my gut. This product is terrible. It leaves a greasy film that won't go away without soap. After just a few uses, I had to throw it out. This was a waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Toby Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I had high hopes for this product. Used it for a week and it made my skin more oily. Gave it a chance but this product is awful.
customer_reviews.author: Katar

customer_reviews.title: This sucks!
customer_reviews.text: Very light, does not moisturize and within 2-3 hours your face is oily. Just as oily as if you have no primer on. I have to reapply powder several times a day. It also does not work well as a primer, does not set your make up. This product is not good. Other NYX products have been great. Would never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: amy tanner

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: I have very oily skin and during summer i get shiny, this product helps my makeup stay on and no shine. Will buy this product over and over
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Pagan

customer_reviews.title: My go to!
customer_reviews.text: I have notoriously oily skin, this is the only thing that prevents my t zone from shining all day. I swear by this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Ina

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is great stuff. As soon as you apply it it diminishes the shine instantly without making it look or feel dry. . My makeup stays in place all day. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: susan darnell

customer_reviews.title: What I’ve been missing!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I’m so happy I found this from a YouTube tutorial! It’s what I’ve been missing in my routine! My face isn’t so oily anymore and it also help the makeup come off earlier and the makeup isn’t sitting straight onto my skin, I love it! Will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Sonnieuk

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: This stuff does the trick for people with oily skin in pics.
customer_reviews.author: lioness85

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Makes your skin feel baby soft and really does cut down the shine. My skin is fairly oily and I’ve loved finding this product.
customer_reviews.author: NerdyTurtle

customer_reviews.title: Can't tell a difference
customer_reviews.text: The feel of this product is light and sheer but it doesn't help with my redness. Sorry, won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Matte and smooth
customer_reviews.text: From the first swipe on, this even made my bare skin look better, let alone primer under my makeup. I’ve been using mattifying lotions for years and this is by far my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Thorton

customer_reviews.title: Silky!
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely oily skin. I wear this instead of powder when I know I’m going to sweat. Silky finish!
customer_reviews.author: CatEyze

customer_reviews.title: Greased
customer_reviews.text: Greasy, slippery. If you really need something cheap it can work in a bind because it does something, but it's pretty slick and greasy.
customer_reviews.author: matthew beeman

customer_reviews.title: Messy and greasy
customer_reviews.text: Hi! My face is a little bit oily. I think i found it a little greasy. I don't know what happened to the container, but on the second day made a big mess on my makeup bag.
customer_reviews.author: PleasedCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t even work my make up can be ready oily
customer_reviews.author: lovetee fofana

customer_reviews.title: Does not reduce oil
customer_reviews.text: So the product feel is like smashbox primer, but it does not reduce oil like it states! It makes your face soft. It also took forever to deliver.
customer_reviews.author: T. Tedrick

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This product feels oily going on. It doesn't even make my face look matte after application. It does nothing to control the shine on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Austey

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this! So lightweight and makes my pores look invisible !
customer_reviews.author: tori

customer_reviews.title: My Skin looks great
customer_reviews.text: Keep my skin not so oily and make up last longer
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hansen Burns

customer_reviews.title: Best low cost primer
customer_reviews.text: I love this primer. I've been using it for about a year already and it's perfect for oily/combination skin.
customer_reviews.author: nat

customer_reviews.title: I love this product so smooth on the skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so smooth on the skin. Keeps the shine down. I have very sensative skin and this worked great for me!
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Does not really work for me!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I have a very oily T-zone. It does not really work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Olaboss

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, not great
customer_reviews.text: It’s not the worst primer I’ve ever used but I’ve definitely had better. I learned buying a slightly more expensive primer is worth the results. It’ll be my back up primer for emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: Burney

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I have oily skin and to prevent shine within just a few hours. I like how it made my face feel silky smooth after application, but it did little to stop the shine after about 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: LocsNSoul

customer_reviews.title: Barely reduces shine
customer_reviews.text: To be fair, I have very oily skin especially in the summer. I applied this everyday under my foundation and shine becomes noticeable after 2-3 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Veronique

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: Expensive and doesn’t work as well as cheaper products. I still end up with a shinny appearance around my nose (my worst spot) by the end of the day. Better than if I used no product at all but, not quite worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Julie Aldrich

customer_reviews.title: It's okay!
customer_reviews.text: I have very oily skin and my hope was that it would cut down on the shine. With the initial application my skin appears to have a matte finish, however, the matte finish doesn't last that long and after an hour or less, I'm shiny again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I have very oily skin and this product took care of that instantly! Makeup stayed all day and did not get oily patches!
customer_reviews.author: Jade pontious

customer_reviews.title: Goes on smooth and matte but does not prevents oily skin from showing
customer_reviews.text: After an hour, your T zone is back to being oily
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: If you have oily skin, do not waste your money. The product does go on vey smoothly, but it does not stop the shine.
customer_reviews.author: Nea'

customer_reviews.title: Decent buy
customer_reviews.text: It does a fairly decent job of controlling shine but I have really oily face so it only got 3 stars
customer_reviews.author: Yvesand

customer_reviews.title: Keeps shine down
customer_reviews.text: This really works! If you have oily skin, I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nae

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Isn't oily at all- just rub in all the way and you're set! It dramatically reduces my shine. I have a naturally shiny complexion and I get very shiny throughout the day around my t zone and under my eyes next to my nose. I've been wearing this regularly and apply it after moisturizing (letting moisturizer set in) & can easily rock the no makeup look with this shine killer!
customer_reviews.author: Daniella

customer_reviews.title: Helps covering oily skin.
customer_reviews.text: I have super oily skin, which I hate. This was an awesome buy and it really does work with helping to make my skin not look so shiny and oily.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: MY ONLY OPTION
customer_reviews.text: Love how it makes my face feel when applying I use this as a hand cream sometimes when I wanna get NASTY.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Shine free
customer_reviews.text: Definitely holds the shine at Bay for at least 8 hours
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I apply this after my day moisturizer before my makeup. A wonderful smooth finish
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally useless!
customer_reviews.text: This product does nothing for my skin. It doesn't make my skin any less shiny after wearing foundation & powder for a few hours. I'm disappointed. Will probably throw away!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Snorek

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I’m SUPER oily and this is heaven. Enough said 💕💕💕
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Great Primer!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product as a primer before applying liquid foundation and finishing with powder. In my experience, a primer allows foundation to spread more smoothly and evenly. It has a smooth colorless petroleum like consistency. A little goes a long way. I do experience a bit of shine in my T Zone after 5/6 hours. Oil absorbing sheets usually rectify the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good for price point but not great
customer_reviews.text: This primer makes my skin feel super smooth and soft before I apply my makeup. It does mattify my combination/oily skin to a certain degree. For daily use it's great, but it doesn't stand up to hot summer weather or dancing in hot night clubs.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan E.

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy again
customer_reviews.text: I still get shiny and it doesn't help makeup stay or fill in pores and lines. It might cut my shine a tiny bit but not much.
customer_reviews.author: April  Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I put it on after my moisturizer before foundation and I stay shine-free all day long. It's the best!!!
customer_reviews.author: Talal

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Made my foubdation separate and look flakey. No noticable difference in my level of shine. Also everytime I open it, product oozes out with out me squeezing the container.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: use this!
customer_reviews.text: Best stuff I've ever used. I'm not sure why I've never used an item such as this. It takes away the shine and works as a wonderful primer. My makeup has never last so long!!
customer_reviews.author: Patty Taguba

customer_reviews.title: Not great for very oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I feel that this helps some, but if you have very oily skin still expect to be use oil pads and anything else you can find throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Used the whole bottle and didnt notice any difference with my shine problem.
customer_reviews.author: Bulkahontas.actual

customer_reviews.title: BEST MATTE PRIMER
customer_reviews.text: I have the oiliest skin ever. This really works me me. Feels very silky too.
customer_reviews.author: M. Feula

customer_reviews.title: greasy greasy greasy
customer_reviews.text: didnt notice any difference in shine, product is sooo greasy
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: It takes the SHINE off without drying your face out. It does exactly what it says.
customer_reviews.author: Vera M. Miller JONES

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like how greasy and oily it was after a while but so far it’s a good only for a few hrs
customer_reviews.author: Melisa torres

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to help with oily skin, works good for the price
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: While I like how it made my face feel (silky smooth)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to prevent shine. While I like how it made my face feel (silky smooth), but it did very little to stop the shine.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works for me, I will definitely be a repeat buyer.
customer_reviews.author: DaleX

customer_reviews.title: Honestly love this product so much
customer_reviews.text: Honestly love this product so much! I have the oiliest skin possible but this keeps me matted out all day. Since using this product I haven't had to touch my makeup up throughout the day it's great ! I alppy a little extra in my T Zone and it's works perfectly ! I wish I came in bigger sizes!
customer_reviews.author: Nakita

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: perfect for teens and oily skin people. My daughter begged to have it and it works great to kill the shine!
customer_reviews.author: Michael & Karen Dennehy

customer_reviews.title: GOES ON SHINY SO HOW CAN IT BE MATTE
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT GOES ON SHINY SO HOW CAN IT BE MATTE? I WON'T BE BUYING AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: jayboogie

customer_reviews.title: not all day but a good shine control primer costs a pretty penny
customer_reviews.text: Works for a few hours, not all day but a good shine control primer costs a pretty penny. You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Kesh

customer_reviews.title: Greasy feeling after its applied. I've tried other products ...
customer_reviews.text: Greasy feeling after its applied. I've tried other products that dry and actually leave your skin oil free and don't feel Greasy. This reduces shine but feels awful
customer_reviews.author: D&BP

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: When I wear makeup my skin can get oily so I like how this product gives me a more matte look.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: NEVER buying this product through Amazon again. The consistency ...
customer_reviews.text: NEVER buying this product through Amazon again. The consistency is different from the one I bought at Ulta Beauty, also is making my face shinier. Just weird.....
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as Becca but does the job if you do ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent primer. Not as good as Becca but does the job if you do not plan on being out all day/night
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: No more oil slicks!
customer_reviews.text: I"m oily, this does the trick. The packaging looked different than the one I recently bought at Ulta. But it works.

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend this prodtuct if you have oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I don't recommend this prodtuct if you have oily skin. It makes your skin even more oily. Won't be buying this product again

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Stops my face from getting oily but causes mild break outs if I use to much

customer_reviews.title: Not one of NYX’s strongest products
customer_reviews.text: Did the exact opposite of what it's supposed to do

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't see how this does anything except priming my face cuz it still gets shiny
customer_reviews.author: Amber O.

customer_reviews.title: It seems to work for a little bit maybe good for 4-6 hours
customer_reviews.text: I have really oily skin, so I was excited to try this. It seems to work for a little bit maybe good for 4-6 hours. But not an 8 hour day!! Disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: great primer
customer_reviews.text: This product has no color, it just helps makeup go on smoother and is a great primer. The only issue I have is it is a small size.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: After a few hours my face still looks like greasy like a pizza
customer_reviews.text: This does not kill any shine! After a few hours my face still looks like greasy like a pizza. I will not buy this anymore.

customer_reviews.title: more silicone based.
customer_reviews.text: its more of a silicone based primer rather than a mattifying

customer_reviews.title: It’s definitely worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. It makes your skin feel like silk and your foundation goes on so smooth.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Works very well for the price. I'd say it's just as good as the top brands. Will buy again!

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Did not kill shine, I ordered to use on my nose. Still shiny!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: a very good feel, makes skin really soft and it does ...
customer_reviews.text: a very good feel ,makes skin really soft and it does what is supposed to do ,I love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product works
customer_reviews.text: At 63 I don't like using powder. This takes the shine off my face with or without makeup
customer_reviews.author: donna deherrera

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several products to eliminate the shine on my face. I have tried the milk of magnesia which I like and will continue to use because this product did not work. I have tried using this product for weeks. Upon application, there was no immediate matte effect and none thereafter. This was truly a waste of money and I am disappointed because I own several NYX products that I enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: cierra smith

customer_reviews.title: Leaves my face so smooth! I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the smooth feeling this leaves on my skin.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was okay, should of bought a spray instead, this one doesn't hold for long

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makeup goes on so much smoother with the primer underneath.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Skin feels great! This is a "must have" moving forward!

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for me.
customer_reviews.text: Love the product consistency, I use it with and without make up. Love the price as well compared to products like smashbox

customer_reviews.title: Still shiny
customer_reviews.text: At first your skin will look matte right after applying but will shortly go back to oily. I would skip this product

product_meta.title: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Shine Killer Primer
product_meta.description: Your ultimate weapon in the war on shine. Smooth it on before your favorite foundation for a fresh, flawless, marvelously matte look that lasts and lasts. Wear it solo, too, for a naturally shine-free look.
feature_bullets: MATTE MAKEUP PRIMER: In the war on shine, NYX Professional Makeup has you covered. Shine Killer is an oil absorbing, anti-shine primer that creates a visible barrier between your skin and your makeup acting as a buffer from outside elements
SMOOTH FINISH: Apply Shine Killer Primer to clean skin before you apply foundation to ensure a smooth, matte, shine-free finish for hours

FACE FROM FOUNDATION TO FINISH: Complete your makeup look with our full line of NYX Professional Makeup face products to aid in color-correction & coverage from blush, bronzer, foundations & contouring concealer to palettes powders & setting sprays
CRUELTY FREE COSMETICS: We believe animals belong in our arms—not in a lab. All of our makeup is certified & acknowledged by PETA as a cruelty-free brand. We don't test any of our products on animals

DISCOVER NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP: Try all of our professional makeup & beauty products today, from eyeshadow, eyeliner, mascara & false lashes to lipstick, foundation, primer, blush, bronzer, brushes & more

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
